Widad Hamdi bụ onye Egypt na-eme ihe nkiri
O mere ihe nkiri karịrị narị isii n'oge ndụ ya, ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ ọrụ ya niile bụ dị ka odibo ma ọ bụ odibo.
A mụrụ Hamdi na Machị 7, 1924, na Kafr El-Sheikh, Egypt

Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Institute of Representation ma gụsịa akwụkwọ mgbe afọ abụọ gasịrị. Hamdi malitere ọrụ ya dị ka onye na-agụ egwu. Ihe nkiri mbụ ya bụ Henry Barakat's This Was My Father's Crime (1945).
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Egyptian National Troupe n'ọtụtụ egwuregwu
Hamdi lara ezumike nká n'afọ ndị 1960 mana a kpọrọ ya ka ọ pụọ n'ala ezumike nkwe ka ọ rụọ ọrụ na egwuregwu Tamr Henna
Hamdi lụrụ di ugboro atọ, onye na-ede egwu Muhammad al-Mougy na ndị na-eme ihe nkiri Salaah Kabeel na Muhammad al-Toukhy.
A mara ya mma ugboro iri atọ na ise n'olu, obi, na afọ
A mara onye gburu ya ikpe ma mesịa gbuo ya. Ọ nwụrụ na obere ego maka aha ya.
